Interfaces
Class TextView

java.lang.Object
  Interfaces.TextView
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.util.Observer
public class TextView
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.util.Observer

TextView is a textual view of the Zuul game. It prints out texts to the screen.

Version:
1.0 (February 2005)
Author:
Charlet Pierre, Kniebihler Nicolas, Provost Kevin
